modName: Mosin Nagant 1891 Skyrim Rifles Gun MOD
summary: A bolt action rifles Made By AangMod for Skyrim Original.
descriptionHtml:
This is The separated items from the Main MOD of Project Norseland.

The animation has updated to beta version with new Animation (same time with new gameplay uploaded).
The next Update will be fixes all the bugs and better Animation.
[color=#00ffff]
[u]This only works in Skyrim Original for PC[/u]
At least newest skyrim update version 1.9.32.8 is needed.
No Dawnguard DLC Requirements for Version 6.1.5
[/color][color=#ffff00]New Version, Version 6.2.0 With Dawnguard DLC Requirements.
[/color]Choose whatever you like within the File version.


[center][u][b][color=#ff0000][size=6]WARNING
[/size][/color][/b][/u]
[color=#ffff00]These Mods is edited some of animation root in CK.

[/color][color=#00ffff]On Version 6.1.5 There is no affect in my bsa files while dawnguard.esm activated.
[/color]
[color=#00ff00][size=3]On Version 6.2.0 Now the MOD Only works properly with Dawnguard DLC.[/size][/color][/center]


[center][color=#00ff00]Version 6.3.0 Gameplay with All Dlc

[youtube]7_YUormSysg[/youtube]

[color=#00ff00]Version 6.2.0 Gameplay with Dawnguard Dlc[/color]
[youtube]ZnKe_nJ43Uo[/youtube]
[/color][/center]
[color=#00ffff][center]Version 6.0 Gameplay no Dawnguard Dlc[/center][/color][center]
[youtube]KI4cvu9AuG4[/youtube][/center]
[color=#00ff00]New Update Version 6.5.0
[/color]Updated Muzzle Flash Effect only (less visual bug depend on higher frame rate)
The rest is the same as version 6.4.0

[color=#00ffff]New update Version 6.4.0
[/color]Updated stuff from last version with the same Muzzle flash effect from version 6.3.0
- Remove knock back effect to staggering impact.
- Bullets now has collision effect to a different texture materials
- the ammo crafting amount is reduced from 10 to 5
- ammo can be find in more container from houses storage to dungeons.
- fixed bug on controller vibration
- reloading animation is still in progress and the animation can be tested.
- all vendor food has more items for cooking stuff, and venison add 1 or 2 more from looting dead deer/elk bodies.
- Blacksmith,Fletcher and miscellaneous vendor has more chance to sell materials for ammo crafting.
New updated stuff
- added silver ammo with Auriel exploding effect, more damage against the undead creatures, can be buy from any vendor mostly in Dawnguard.
- added silver ammo craft recipe and ultimate lotus extract poison recipe, sold by Florentius (very expensive recipe).
- added vanilla chit chat follower by Lydia voice type.
- added vanilla jewelry,Akaviri blades with unique Enchantment, and specific enchanted items for followers (located in skyhaven temple chest).
- added modified script for removing chance of recovering bullets from dead bodies when equip rifle weapons, except bow type weapon were remain    has hunter discipline perks.


New update Version 6.3.0
Add new right handed bolt action, the esm still the same as V.6.2.5.
The reloading animation system is in progress.
Fixed bug on Dwarven Crossbow weapon motion.

The vanilla changes as follow Version 6.2.5
1. Same stuff from previous version of 6.2.0
2. Changing Perk tree for Telescopic Eye, now no longer needed Bullseye Perk Instead Ranger and Quick shot perks is needed.
3. More craftable materials with better chance from loot or vendor trade.
4. The Knockback effect is half decrased.
5. Add unenchanted Sorine Dawnguard light helmet inside Dawnguard Cache.
6. 7.62 ammo damage and cost is decreased.

The vanilla changes as follow Version 6.2.0
1. Same stuff from previous version of 6.1.5[i][i]
[/i][/i]2. New Animation root in CK.
3. New Animation root which make "Dwarven Crosbow" Animation Event Change to "crossbowattackstart".
4. The Mosin-Nagant now use the animation event which previously used by Dwarven Crossbow weapons.
5. Wrong Type of ammo will popup Notification Text at top left of the screen, this script works when equip the weapons.

The vanilla changes as follow Version 6.1.5
1. Replace Animation hkx files in crossbowdrwarven (Updated Animation).[i][i]
[/i][/i]2. Added New Perk "Telescopic Eye" at level 100 of Marksman Skill and has "Bullseye" Perk is needed.
3. Added ammo for sale some of vendor.
4. Added Crucial Food to manage Stamina and Health and re-edit effect some food.
5. Edit some VendorItemsBlacksmith,Apothecary,Fletcher.....etc



[color=#00ffff]How to Install[/color]

[color=#00ff00]Version 6.4.0 and 6.5.0[/color]
Move[color=#00ffff] Aang Mosin Nagant v_6.4.0.rar [/color]or[color=#00ffff] Aang Mosin Nagant v_6.5.0.rar [/color]to your Skyrim/Data Folder then "extract here", remember "Skyrim/Data" folder.
Activate the MOD from Skyrim launcher...enjoy

[color=#00ff00]Version 6.2.5
[/color]Replace your esm files with this new updated one. No changing for other files except "esm" files on version 6.2.0
You have to rename it the exact name both "bsa" and "esm".
For example [color=#00ffff]Aang Mosin Nagant v_6.4.0.esm [/color]and[color=#00ffff] Aang Mosin Nagant v_6.4.0.bsa
[/color]or [u][color=#ffff00]you can rename it[/color][/u] as you like, and both files the "esm" and "bsa" must the exact same name, but don't change that, after you already play and save the game.

[color=#cc0000]Version 6.0[/color]
Just Put [color=#00ffff]Aang Mosin Nagant.esp[/color] & [color=#ffff00]Aang Mosin Nagant.bsa[/color] to your skyrim/data Folder
Activate the MOD from Skyrim launcher...enjoy

[color=#00ffff]How to get some
[/color]Go to Angi's Camp at most southern of the map, near from Falkreath town to south-east, at the edge most western of Jerral Mountain ridges.
You will Find a Mosin-Nagant Rifles...above the cookspit inside her Shack settlement.

[color=#ffff00][size=3]>>>>>>>>>>>>>>Known Bugs!<<<<<<<<<<<<<<<[/size][/color]
[u][color=#ffff00]The Muzzle Flash is still buggy, you might shoot in firstperson view first, rather the 3rd person view at the first shot.[/color][/u]
- There is no reload animation, that's combined in shot release animation.
- No reload which make any shot release animation can be skipped, by pressing sheath or unsheathed key while shot release animation started ( this only   for Not Supported Dawnguard DLC.).
- NPC cannot use Mosin Nagant, the Shoot Animation Event is working but release animation never start, so dont gave it to your Follower.
- on version 6.2.0 all NPC use all bolt type of ammo because NPC cant select ammo even thought there is a script in some of the weapons.
- The weapon has Knockback Enchantment, some time while enemies stand up from its knockback its become invicible.

[color=#ff7700]Version 6.1.5 Fix[/color]
Fixed Disapearing Weapons when droped.
Fixed Finger Animation on Fisrtperson view.

[color=#00ff00]Version 6.2.0 Fix[/color]
Same fixed as previous version 6.1.5
Support for Dawnguard.esm
New Animation root.

[color=#ff00ff]ADVANTAGES[/color]
Higher Damage than Bows (you will getting a smiling grin).
Easy a Long range Kill, more with sneak attack and hard to detect by Enemy even at Starting Level.
Zooming with slow motion, tracer looks nicely to hit enemy target at long distance.
ammo can be created at forges, but weapon is never had a chance (Not Lore-Friendly).
Unlimited ammo capacity, you know...no reload.
Killing guards or any Npc Member that has CrimeFaction will not count as bounty on a very long Distance Engagement.

[color=#ff0000]DISADVANTAGES[/color]
Low Rate of Fire....same thing like Bows.
Rare Weapon...[color=#ffff00]be Advice to save the Game before you lose it[/color]....Instead the weapon only has 2 in the game.
The crafting ammo and food materials is plenty even you can find it where ever you take the journey.
When testing like in the gameplay above, starting level is quite difficult to gain 7.62mm ammo.
Not good in close combat.
[color=#ffff00][u][b][size=3]
How to uninstall
[/size][/b][/u][/color]This is very Important to manage within other Mods which using meshes/actors folder....so If you want to get you're animation back to its original.
make sure the folder is not using by other mods before delete it.
the adding folder was.....inside Data folder then..
[color=#ffff00]meshes/actors/characters/_1stperson/animations/dlc01....delete the [u]dlc01[/u] folder
[/color][color=#ffff00]meshes/actors/characters/animations/dlc01....delete the [u]dlc01[/u] folder
[color=#ffff00]meshes/dlc01....delete the [u]dlc01[/u] folder[/color][/color]
then the other folder like script never be deleted instead delete the [u]script files [/u]
[color=#ffff00]scripts/[u]AangAmmoMessage.pex[/u][/color][color=#ffff00]
[/color][color=#ffff00]scripts/[u]AangAutoEquipAmmo.pex[/u]
scripts/Source/[u]AangAmmoMessage.psc[/u]
scripts/Source/[u]AangAutoEquipAmmo.psc[/u][/color]
delete [u]pex[/u] and [u]psc[/u] file name above, do not delete the [u]script[/u] folder.
The rest file to be deleted is [u]bsa[/u] and [u]esm[/u] files.
Thats its.

The Next Update is in cosidering, as the unfinished reloading system.
So Keep update :)
author: AangMOD
